document.discussion_title: Mike Santoli: Passive investing takeover accelerates in 2016
document.topic_text: Mike Santoli: Passive investing takeover accelerates in 2016 From Stock PicksAugust 21, 2016 - 8:34pm CNBC senior markets commentator Mike Santoli looks at the surge of money into index funds and ETFs this year and whether this passive takeover is creating an opportunity for active managers.
document.post: Mike Santoli: Passive investing takeover accelerates in 2016 From Stock PicksAugust 21, 2016 - 8:34pm CNBC senior markets commentator Mike Santoli looks at the surge of money into index funds and ETFs this year and whether this passive takeover is creating an opportunity for active managers.
